title: Festive berry delice
description: This beautiful dessert is perfect for parties because it can be made in advance and requires no baking. Serve chilled. For this recipe, you will need a sugar thermometer, a food processor, a muslin cloth and a 20-22cm/8-8½in chefs' ring.
ingredients: 3 gelatine leaves, soaked in cold water until softened, then drained
4 gelatine leaves, soaked in cold water until softened, then drained
